dict.acceptation: 大部分，多半；主要地；基本上；通常；

sent.orig: The resulting fetuses consisted of either mostly paternally or mostly maternally expressed genes.
sent.trans: 这样产生的胎儿要么主要是父方的基因表达，要么主要是母方的基因表达。

sent.orig: I need mostly Asian female fans from 25-45 mostly in CA and the Los angels areas.
sent.trans: 我需要25-45主要在加州和洛杉矶地区的大部分亚洲女性球迷。

sent.orig: First, melt reduces sea ice cover, replacing mostly light-reflecting sea ice with mostly light-absorbing seawater.
sent.trans: 首先，它降低了海冰的覆盖率，大量反射光线的海冰被吸收光线的海水所取代。

sent.orig: Unlike snow, which is mostly air, ice is mostly ice.
sent.trans: 雪主要是空气，冰就不一样了，冰主要就是冰。

sent.orig: Rich coastal enclaves remain mostly white. Poor areas, which are mostly Hispanic, are no more diverse.
sent.trans: 富裕的沿海飞地仍然大多归属白人，贫穷区大多是西班牙人，无多元可言。
